page.title: 07ST.JAMES' CH. BURTON LAZARS
page.content: The Sunday services take place in the mornings only from 10.30.a.m. to about 12.00.About 78 people go there averaging 36 at normal services.About 12 children go to Sunday School.Other services include weddings and funerals.Workmen have just put new stones in the walls.The churchyard has a little garden where people go and sit.The garden has one gate.There is one bench and a water fountain but it does not work and flowers have grown out of it.The church has one metal gate by the main door.At the top of the church there is a cross.The Rev. John Peel based at St. Mary's Melton takes most of the services.The church is the only building for{religion }in Burton.
